Description:
The FHIR Observation resource defines measurements and assertions about a patient, including vital signs, laboratory data, imaging results, devices measurements, clinical assessment tools, personal characteristics, social history, and core characteristics.

Obstetric information is categorized under social history.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Use "social-history" to search for smoking history and OB/Gyn details.
category.Optional: Either this or code must be provided, not both.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
The LOINC code of the observation. Supported search codes include:

  • 82810-3 Pregnancy Status
  • 3146-8 Menstrual Status
  • 63895-7 Lactation Status
  • 72166-2 Smoking History
  • 32486-3 Physical Findings of Uterus
  • 11778-8 Estimated Delivery Date
  • 8665-2 Last Menstrual Period
code.Optional: Either this or category must be provided, but not both.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource. If both patient and subject are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Observation.Name: Observation
Observation.Description: An instance of the R4 Observation resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description:
The LOINC Code of the Observation.

Observation Type

LOINC Code

Pregnancy Status

82810-3

Menstrual Status

3146-8

Lactation Status

63895-7

Smoking History

72166-2

Physical Findings of Uterus

32486-3

Estimated Delivery Date

11778-8

Last Menstrual Period

8665-2

dataAbsentReason.Name: dataAbsentReason
dataAbsentReason.Description:
Populated if there is no last menstrual period but there is a last menstrual period comment or precision.
Populated if there is no lactation status but there is a lactation status comment.

derivedFrom.Name: derivedFrom
derivedFrom.Description: References the corresponding menstrual status observation that the pregnancy status is derived from.

interpretation.Name: interpretation
interpretation.Description: Precision of the last menstrual period.

note.Name: note
note.Description: Populated with last menstrual period comment. If applicable, this appears within the last menstrual period or lactation status observations
note.Optional: Requires a last menstrual period comment.

valueBoolean.Name: valueBoolean
valueBoolean.Description: Yes/No answer to whether the patient has a uterus.
valueBoolean.Optional: Used for Physical Findings of Uterus.

valueCodeableConcept.Name: valueCodeableConcept
valueCodeableConcept.Description:
The SNOMED code indicating whether the observation is present is used for Pregnancy Status and Lactation Status::
  • Yes (373066001)
  • No (373067005)
  • Unknown (261665006)

Epic category-based code specific to an organization or mapped to other SNOMED codes might be used for Menstrual Status.
valueCodeableConcept.Optional: Used for Lactation Status, Pregnancy Status, and Menstrual Status.

valueDateTime.Name: valueDateTime
valueDateTime.Description: The estimated delivery date, if applicable.
